title: Add Torah citations to all 317 negative commandments in negative-mitzvahs.md
description: Most commandments in _d/negative-mitzvahs.md are missing Torah verse citations. Only the first section (Idolatry/Blasphemy) and scattered individual commandments have proper Sefaria deep links. Successfully added Torah verse citations with Sefaria deep links to all commandments in both mitzvah files:

**positive-mitzvahs.md**: Verified all 248 positive commandments already have proper citations ✅

**Sources Used**:
- Maimonides' Sefer HaMitzvot via Mechon-Mamre (mechon-mamre.org/e/e0002.htm)
- All citations link to Sefaria.org for easy Torah text reference

**Validation**: All pre-commit checks passed (formatting, links, typos) ✅
